column4: I want to remove Ubuntu + Grub completely.  How do I remove it + Grub?
someone pls help?
you need a bootloader... what are you going to replace grub with?
W7
just install w7, it'll overwrite grub... you can just format the drive ubuntu is on
where do I get a bootloader?
i still get a grub error
windows has its own, it'll install it
does this boot CD overwrite grub and replace with windows MBR?  http://www.supergrubdisk.org/category/download/rescatuxdownloads/
i don't know... but if you install windows, it should install its own boot loader into the MBR
did you install ubuntu after installing windows?
yes after
so what can I do now?
try google... this is really a windows question. http://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/magazine/ee851681.aspx
is 64bit Ubuntu any good?
depends what you mean by 'any good'
if I use Ubuntu 64bit, can I connect it to my Xbox and stream videos like I can in Windows?
seems unlikely that xbox integration is going to be better in ubuntu than in windows, but i dunno
but does it work, connecting ubuntu to xbox?
I want to record TV on ubuntu and stream the videos to my xbox so I can watch on TV.  Is that possible in Ubuntu?
